short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome Extension to add fun features to the Guardian Crossword site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a shortcut to the crosswords site, navigation buttons to more easily move between crosswords, lets you check all answers by hitting the spacebar, and congratulates you upon completion.


All it does is inject this script into any guardian crossword page: https://github.com/LukeStorry/guard-cross/blob/main/contentScript.js
